lyrics:
"Going Crazy With The Work" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Going Crazy With The Work" (with Young Dolph) [Hook:] I'm in the hood going crazy with that work I'm in the station A moving, A plus I'm in the hood going crazy with that work The loud high brudda I don't give a fuck I'm in the hood going crazy with these peeps Gucci got a super deal on the keeps They say we got the streets sprung on that stupid Now all they wanna shop with is Dolph and Gucci [Verse 1:] Gucci's winning got a new trap house A 2 story building just for us to trap out Dogs got bound that boy Gucci trap rule maze I steal your bitch mouth full of cum like it's 2 pay My bridge is sagging full of money My stereophone muddy Pull a 4 in the ginger red now it taste like bubbly I make this shit look fun nigga that's why your kids love me It's your sister and your cousin and your bitch wanna fuck me I'm in the hood pumping weight going crazy Sagging up these bail Gucci cooking up them babies And the same bitch you kiss and calling baby Asked me not let her and let you think that's your baby [Hook:] I'm in the hood going crazy with that work I'm in the station A moving, A plus I'm in the hood going crazy with that work The loud high brudda I don't give a fuck I'm in the hood going crazy with these peeps Gucci got a super deal on the keeps They say we got the streets sprung on that stupid Now all they wanna shop with is Dolph and Gucci [Verse 2:] Call my nigga Dolph set the weed I'm a work the south I'm a be the shooter dog, you can be the fucking boss Trapping on that fucking log, I ain't tripping on no house I ain't barely sowed it in, time I'm a take you out And I feel team master P I'm a break you off TC I'm a be the lid I'm a burn your house You know Gucci man don't ever buy this tongue he don't call you out Fit the bricks in the drawer, fuck it I'm a stall 'em out Gucci man the dog trap, how did it burn again Weight that gym badge nigga we be pumpin Roll like I need a haystack Rumpelstiltskin You disagre now I dog head double diner sim sim [Hook:] I'm in the hood going crazy with that work I'm in the station A moving, A plus I'm in the hood going crazy with that work The loud high brudda I
